Name: Numeric digits can be entered in text field in contact form.
Description:
When the costumer is required to fill in his phone number only numeric digits will be accepted .
Expected - the phone number filed will not accept letters in contact us form.
Actual - the phone number filed accepts letters in contact us form.
Steps to reproduce:
1.go to: www.ashqelon.net
2.go to: "המייל האדום"
3. enter letters  in "phone number" filed .
4. confirm the "I am not a robot" request .
5.press on "send".
Environment:
Firefox Version 83.0

Microsoft Edge Version 87.0.664.60

Chrome Version 87.0.4280.88
Lenovo Windows 10

The intend was to show the schedule and pictures of the Ashqeloni dancing  band but the pictures are missing and the links are broken (404 error)

Actual - the pictures are missing and the links are broken (404 error)

2. go to: "אביבה בדרכים"
3. go to: "מועדון אקסודוס"
4. scroll to the end of he page.
Environment:
Firefox Version 83.0

Microsoft Edge Version 87.0.664.60

Chrome Version 87.0.4280.88

Lenovo Windows 10
